info.name: Snowflake Constructor
info.description:
Snowflake Generation 4 fork.
Space - restart,
Mouse press - clear hexagonal hole and put snowflake seed,
CTRL + Mouse press: Control surrounding temperature (beta) by vertical mouse position,
and additive cold (gamma) by horizontal mouse position.

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
const bool usePalette = false;
const bool vertical = false;

#define STYLE 3

#if STYLE == 0
    const float alpha = 0.5;    // laplacian feedback coefficient
    const float gamma = 0.0005; // additive component
    const float beta = 0.3;     // initial surrounding temperature
    const bool randomize = true;
#elif STYLE == 1
    const float alpha = 1.0;    // laplacian feedback coefficient
    const float gamma = 0.005; // additive component
    const float beta = 0.45;     // initial surrounding temperature
    const bool randomize = false;
#elif STYLE == 2
    const float alpha = 2.54;    // laplacian feedback coefficient
    const float gamma = 0.0005; // additive component
    const float beta = 0.15;     // initial surrounding temperature
    const bool randomize = false;
#else
    const float alpha = 2.54;    // laplacian feedback coefficient
    const float gamma = 0.0005; // additive component
    const float beta = 0.25;     // initial surrounding temperature
    const bool randomize = true;
#endif
